options.text: <color=#AE49FF>Worm</color>: Traveler... welcome to our shattered land. We have prayed for someone touched by <color=#AE49FF>magic</color> like you.

Our villages lie hollow and dim. The hordes of the <color=#AE49FF>Demon Kingdom</color> swarm from the cracks of the earth, hunting us without mercy.

We are small, fragile… and powerless to stop them. But you—your aura burns with ancient <color=#AE49FF>mystic power</color>.

Please… help us purge this darkness. Help us reclaim our home, so our children may once again crawl beneath a sky of <color=#AE49FF>peace</color>.
